#### <a name="intune-bundles-service-limits"></a>Intune 捆绑包服务限制

| 请求类型 | 所有应用的每个租户的使用限制 | 每个租户每个应用限制 |
| ------------ | ----------------------------- | ------------------------ |
| POST, PUT, DELETE, PATCH | 每 20 秒 200 个请求 | 每 20 秒 100 个请求 |
| 任何 | 每 20 秒 2000 个请求 | 每 20 秒 1000 个请求 |

上述限制适用于下列资源:  

| <!-- fake header-->                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                       | <!-- fake header-->                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| <ul> <li> [assignmentFilterEvaluationStatusDetails](/graph/api/resources/assignmentfilterevaluationstatusdetails) <li> [deviceAndAppManagementAssignmentFilter](/graph/api/resources/deviceandappmanagementassignmentfilter) <li> [deviceCompliancePolicyPolicySetItem](/graph/api/resources/devicecompliancepolicypolicysetitem) <li> [deviceConfigurationPolicySetItem](/graph/api/resources/deviceconfigurationpolicysetitem) <li> [deviceManagementConfigurationPolicyPolicySetItem](/graph/api/resources/devicemanagementconfigurationpolicypolicysetitem) <li> [deviceManagementScriptPolicySetItem](/graph/api/resources/devicemanagementscriptpolicysetitem) <li> [enrollmentRestrictionsConfigurationPolicySetItem](/graph/api/resources/enrollmentrestrictionsconfigurationpolicysetitem) <li> [iosLobAppProvisioningConfigurationPolicySetItem,](/graph/api/resources/ioslobappprovisioningconfigurationpolicysetitem,) <li> [managedAppProtectionPolicySetItem](/graph/api/resources/managedappprotectionpolicysetitem) </ul> | <ul> <li>[managedDeviceMobileAppConfigurationPolicySetItem](/graph/api/resources/manageddevicemobileappconfigurationpolicysetitem) <li> [mdmWindowsInformationProtectionPolicyPolicySetItem](/graph/api/resources/mdmwindowsinformationprotectionpolicypolicysetitem) <li> [mobileAppPolicySetItem](/graph/api/resources/mobileapppolicysetitem) <li> [policySet](/graph/api/resources/policyset) <li> [policySetAssignment](/graph/api/resources/policysetassignment) <li> [policySetItem](/graph/api/resources/policysetitem) <li> [targetedManagedAppConfigurationPolicySetItem](/graph/api/resources/targetedmanagedappconfigurationpolicysetitem) <li> [windows10EnrollmentCompletionPageConfigurationPolicySetItem](/graph/api/resources/windows10enrollmentcompletionpageconfigurationpolicysetitem) <li> [windowsAutopilotDeploymentProfilePolicySetItem](/graph/api/resources/windowsautopilotdeploymentprofilepolicysetitem) </ul> |
